short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This project is using HTML5 Gamepad API which can monitor your gamepads connected to your computer in a web browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can add this HTML5 Gamepad Detector with your game play recording or streaming, interact with your audience.
